channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Dog
channel.description:
## Portrait
![dog|690x373](upload://uqfPCjZkRGBZDy4bQSDbbGlIwLC.jpg)
**Dog** [color=lighblue]Blue Dragon Social[/color] **Too cute**(Passive) Immune to first attack,if attacked twice will die **Dog after all** (Passive) - You can only say woof during day **Woof!** (Day) - Bark at a player. They will run away and be unable to talk,vote or be voted. - 2 uses **Good dog!** (Night) - Pick 2 players. First player gets to type a message that you bring to second player.Second player doesnt know that first player sent the message. - Unlimited uses **Goal** : Defeat [color=purple]Unseen[/color][color=red]/Cult[/color] and any [color=gray]Neutrals[/color] that seek you harm.
## [color=red]Convert[/color]
## Portrait ![doggo|295x301](upload://a4GNJ2KHoqEZ8AUJLqHaxuFJ79d.jpg)
## [color=purple]Bad dog[/color] **Too cute** (Passive) Immune to first attack,if attacked twice will die **Dog after all** (Passive) - You can only say woof during day **Woof!** (Day) - Bark at a player. They will run away and be unable to talk,vote or be voted. - 2 uses **Bad dog!** (Night) - Choose 2 players.First player can send a message to second one. Second player wont know who send him the message.Bad dog can fake the message. **Goal** : Defeat [color=lighblue]Blue Dragon[/color] and any [color=gray]Neutrals[/color] that seek you harm.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Dog
item.dc:creator: Memesky
item.description:
Portrait

Dog
Blue Dragon Social
Too cute(Passive) Immune to first attack,if attacked twice will die
Dog after all (Passive) - You can only say woof during day
Woof! (Day) - Bark at a player. They will run away and be unable to talk,vote or be voted. - 2 uses
Good dog! (Night) - Pick 2 players. First player gets to type a message that you bring to second player.Second player doesnt know that first player sent the message. - Unlimited uses
Goal : Defeat Unseen/Cult and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

Convert

Portrait

Bad dog

Too cute (Passive) Immune to first attack,if attacked twice will die
Dog after all (Passive) - You can only say woof during day
Woof! (Day) - Bark at a player. They will run away and be unable to talk,vote or be voted. - 2 uses
Bad dog! (Night) - Choose 2 players.First player can send a message to second one. Second player wont know who send him the message.Bad dog can fake the message.
Goal : Defeat Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.
